amendment.description: Amendment gives the chairmen of the appropriations committees, rather than the Director of CBO, the power to adjust budget allocations to reflect lock-box savings, and applies the provisions of the bill to the FY 1996 Defense and Labor/HHS appropriations bills.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of September 12, 1995, to give the chairmen of the appropriations committees, rather than the Director of CBO, the power to adjust budget allocations to reflect lock-box savings, and to apply the provisions of the bill to the FY 1996 Defense and Labor/HHS appropriations bills.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
